grails.plugins.quartz
[Groovy] Class JobManagerService

java.lang.Object
  grails.plugins.quartz.JobManagerService

class JobManagerService

JobManagerService simplifies interaction with the Quartz Scheduler from Grails application.

Authors:
Marco Mornati (mmornati@byte-code.com)
Sergey Nebolsin (nebolsin@gmail.com)
Since:
0.4

Method Detail

getAllJobs

java.lang.Object getAllJobs()
Returns all the jobs, registered in the Quartz Scheduler, grouped bu their corresponding job groups.
Returns:
Map > with job group names as keys

getJobs

java.lang.Object getJobs(java.lang.String group)
Returns all the jobs, registered in the Quartz Scheduler, which belong to the specified group.
Parameters:
group - — the jobs group name
Returns:
a list of corresponding JobDescriptor objects

getRunningJobs

java.lang.Object getRunningJobs()
Returns a list of all currently executing jobs.
Returns:
a List, containing all currently executing jobs.
